question: LoL: T1 vs DK
description:
This market will resolve to “T1” if T1 win against DK in the named League of Legends match.

This market will resolve to “DK” if DK win against T1 in the League of Legends match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from liquipedia: https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page

description:

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - September 20, 8AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on September 20?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Sep 19 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Sep 20 '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Sep 19 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Sep 20 '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Sep 19 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Sep 20 '25 12:00 ET candle.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be between $110,000 and $112,000 on September 25?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) on the date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Ethereum Up or Down on September 20?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT Sep 19 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Sep 20 '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT Sep 19 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Sep 20 '25 12:00 ET candle.

question: Jimmy Kimmel hosts an episode of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" by September 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Jimmy Kimmel hosts an episode of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" between September 18, and September 30, 2025 ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Jimmy Kimmel is definitively fired from his position as host of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!", or otherwise quits, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

If ABC or its parent company announces "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" is cancelled within timeframe, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be the relevant episode of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!", however a consensus of credible reporting, including announcements made by ABC, may also be used.

question: Will Trump designate ANTIFA a terrorist organization by September 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the U.S. government formally designates Antifa as a terrorist organization by September 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

This includes designation as a Foreign Terrorist Organization and/or as a Specially Designated Global Terrorist (SDGT), as well as executive action by the President, legislation signed into law, or the creation of a new federal designation that formally designates Antifa as a terrorist organization.

Statements by government officials, including the President, DHS, or FBI, will not count unless accompanied by a formal designation.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Another 7.0 or above earthquake by October 31?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if 1 or more earthquakes with a magnitude of 7.0 or higher occur anywhere on Earth between September 18, 5:00 PM, and October 31, 2025 ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market is the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Earthquake Hazards Program (https://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/browse/significant.php#sigdef).

If an earthquake of substantial size has occurred within this market's timeframe but not yet appeared on the resolution source, this market may remain open until November 7, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, or until the earthquake in question otherwise appears on the resolution source. If such an earthquake has not appeared on the resolution source by that date, another credible resolution source will be used.
